title: Tastefully Furnished Luxury 3 Bedroom Apartment @ Sky Garden Res for Sale
details:
The SkyGardens is a magnificent and awe-inspiring high- rise with an impeccable pedigree and real cachet. From the unprecedented elegance of its architectural brilliance to the beauty of its surroundings, nestled in the scenic natural wetlands, overlooking the Diyawanna Lake and the Colombo Cityscape, Fairway SkyGardens resonates epitome of luxury vertical living. Built with straight-line minimalist style architecture, the state-of-the-art apartments at SkyGardens stand testimony to the aesthetic design and modern engineering features Fairway Group is renowned for. While some apartments boast well-planned landscaped terrace gardens, the rooftop SkyGarden flaunts a spectacular view of greenery all around. Fairway SkyGardens brings to vivid life the vision of an urban space high in the sky, in a spot blessed with luxury and great natural beauty.

Located in confines of Rajagiriya, bordering Sri Jayewardenepura Kotte.

This epitome of stunning architecture is created for a truly unmatched living experience. With spectacular views of the surroundings, the natural wetlands and the Diyawanna Lake, the lavish details at SkyGardens exceed every expectation. With resort-like amenities, such as a magnificent swimming pool, a state of the art gym, badminton court, squash court, basketball court, clubhouse and diner, the apartments are adorned with floor-to-ceiling windows, marble, granite or engineered timber floors while kitchens with under counter lighting and fully fitted state-of-art stylish cabinetry add a touch of refinement. An attention to detail and the finest quality details and finishes are delivered with a level of craftsmanship that is truly beyond experience.

Built with straight-line minimalist style architecture and well-planned landscaped terrace gardens, SkyGardens will be as much of a wonder to behold, as it will be to live in.

The apartment comes tastefully furnished with high-end classy furniture & fittings with magnificent panoramic view of Adams Peak Mountain Ranges.The Floor Area is 1,450sqft and the said apartment located on a higher floor(above the 20th).It consist of 3 bedrooms,3 bathrooms,living & sitting & dining areas,fully loaded Pantry,maids quarters and 2 dedicated parking slots.

Quoted Selling Price :- LKR 48.50 Million

NO BROKERS/AGENTS PLEASE
